  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 08/20/2024 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL BCT Service Center, 420 S. Congress Avenue, Delray Beach, FL 33445 Transportation by road confirmed. Shipment also contains UN3480 Lithium ion batteries Class 9 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Case Material of Construction: Plastic Package Capacity: 517 g Amount in Package: 517 g Number in Shipment: 1 Number Failed: 1
